title: –û–±–Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ—Å–æ–≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–∏–º—ã—Ö –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–π (Breaking Changes Detection)

content: Pre-commit / pre-push hook if [ $current_branch = $protected_branch ]; then echo "Running breaking changes check..." easyp breaking --against HEAD~1 if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then echo "‚ùå Breaking changes detected. Push rejected." exit 1 fi echo "‚úÖ No breaking changes detected." fi ```

content: Configuration File The easyp.yaml file is the main configuration file for EasyP, defining how your proto files are linted, generated, and managed. This file is typically placed at the root of your project alongside your proto files.

excerpt: Dependency Format **Format variations:** owner/repo - Latest commit from default branch owner/repo@v1.0.0 - Specific git tag owner/repo@47b927cbb41c4fdea1292baf - Full commit hash github.com/owner/repo@version - Full URL
